body_html: I think it should be glorot_uniform_initializer but maybe @fchollet has a better suggestion. (I think xavier is more common in literature/on the internet but using the last name of the author is maybe more appropriate and keras uses it already as well)
body_text: I think it should be glorot_uniform_initializer but maybe @fchollet has a better suggestion. (I think xavier is more common in literature/on the internet but using the last name of the author is maybe more appropriate and keras uses it already as well)
body: I think it should be `glorot_uniform_initializer` but maybe @fchollet has a better suggestion. (I think xavier is more common in literature/on the internet but using the last name of the author is maybe more appropriate and keras uses it already as well)
